## WebMessage.postToGlobal() method

向顶层窗口发送消息

**Signature:**

```typescript
postToGlobal(message?: string, filter?: string, source?: string): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  message | string | _(Optional)_ 要发送的消息 |
|  filter | string | _(Optional)_ 消息过滤器 |
|  source | string | _(Optional)_ 目标窗口的源信息，默认为 '\*' |

**Returns:**

void
